title: New University of Minnesota Degree Program Will Train the Next Generation of Human Rights Leaders ...
text: ( Source : University of Minnesota ) From the plight of Syrian refugees crossing Europe to the battle against human trafficking in Minnesota , issues of human rights span the globe and are highlighted daily by news headlines. Now a new graduate
